about_the_game:
Original 'Tormented Souls' score by NyxTheShield and Begoña A. Carrasco.
This DLC contains all 24 tracks (MP3/WAV) from Tormented Souls. Enjoy a compelling soundtrack and immerse yourself in that almost unbearable atmosphere.

TRACK LISTING

1 Tormented Souls/b] by Begoña A. Carrasco
2 Thoughtless Trip by NyxTheShield
3 Delusional by Begoña A. Carrasco
4 Momentary Asylum by NyxTheShield
5 Frenzied by Begoña A. Carrasco
6 Holy Sanctuary by NyxTheShield
7 Shattered Echoes by NyxTheShield
8 Low Tension by Begoña A. Carrasco
9 Mirrored Monolith by NyxTheShield
10 High Tension by Begoña A. Carrasco
11 The Reception Hall by NyxTheShield
12 Uncertainty by Begoña A. Carrasco
13 Cursed Soul by NyxTheShield
14 Inescrutable by Begoña A. Carrasco
15 Tape Degradation by NyxTheShield
16 Anna's Theme by Begoña A. Carrasco
17 Anna's Music Box by NyxTheShield
18 Sewers by NyxTheShield
19 Bunker by NyxTheShield
20 Monstrum by NyxTheShield
21 Quiet Withdrawal by NyxTheShield
22 Persistiendo by NyxTheShield
23 End of Torment by NyxTheShield
24 Tape Degradation (Unused Version) by NyxTheShield
25 Persistiendo (HQ Version) by NyxTheShield
